alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 4:18AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN LYCOMING...SULLIVAN AND SOUTHERN TIOGA COUNTIES THROUGH 500 AM EDT... At 417 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles northwest of Jersey Shore, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Morris, Blossburg, Arnot, Overton, Kettle Creek Gorge, Ralston, Cedar Run, Cammal, Trout Run, Lincoln Falls, Barbours, Shunk, Leetonia, Ogdensburg, Slate Run, English Center, Muncy Valley, Buttonwood, Dushore and Laporte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Tioga
